unittitle_ssm: Collection of cabinet photographs from Brooklyn photography studios
abstract_ssm: The three cabinet photographs are black-and-white studio portraits of one unidentified man, one man identified as Leroy, and one women identified as Grandma Sieman. The three Brooklyn-based photography studios that produced the photographs are: Richardson Brothers whose studio was located at 113 and 115 Broadway, below Bedford Avenue; Chapman & Co. located at 364 and 365 Bedford Avenue; and S. Olsen located at 240 Columbia Street.
collection_ssm: Collection of cabinet photographs from Brooklyn photography studios
